main event: A student and his cousin observed an unidentified flying object while atop a mountain in North Carolina in early September 1963.
interesting points: The object was flying from northeast to southwest., The sighting took place about fifteen miles east of Hendersonville, N.C., The object's altitude was approximately one-third of a mile above and 300 yards in front of the observers., It made no sound during its passage and did not appear to have any visible propulsion., The object rotated around its central axis while flying and seemed to move at an unusually fast speed.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object, saucer-shaped with a dome and fins
